page.title: 17Rotherham Police
page.content: The police station was opened on July 1st 1983. It has 283 rooms on 5 floors. The first floor is operational, the second, and third administration and the fourth is recreational. The station has 8 male and 5 female cells. There are 6 stables and 8 dog kennels. A policeman is on duty all day in the station. There are 15 other stations in Rotherham. There are 20 policemen working in the station. They work 3 different shifts. PC Jones has been a community policemen at Kimberworth for 6 years. He has arrested a person with a gun. He has caught people shoplifting and breaking into cars. The largest offence he has handled is manslaughter. He has been injured on patrol. He was 22 when he joined the police force and works 8 hours a day.
